definitions.definition: A drawing , often held as a fundraiser , in which tickets or chances are sold to win a prize .
examples: He entered a raffle to win a lifetime supply of toothpaste, but he did not win.

definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) A game of dice in which the player who throws three of the same number wins all the stakes.
( Philippines , law ) The system by which cases are assigned to judges in multi- sala courts.

main_definition: A drawing , often held as a fundraiser , in which tickets or chances are sold to win a prize .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A game of dice in which the player who throws three of the same number wins all the stakes.
( Philippines , law ) The system by which cases are assigned to judges in multi- sala courts.
